text: Oliver Alexander Thornton (born 15 July 1990), better known as Olly Alexander, is an English singer and actor from Harrogate. He was the lead singer of the band Years & Years from 2010 to 2021. He continued releasing music under the name 'Years & Years' until 2023. Alexander has also made several television appearances including performing the lead role in the Channel 4 series It's a Sin. He represented the United Kingdom in the Eurovision Song Contest 2024 with the song "Dizzy", finishing 18th with 46 points. == References == Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:English singers Category:English LGBT people Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from Harrogate Category:Musicians from Yorkshire
title: Olly Alexander
